winters_append.title: Winter's Append
tooltip.winters_append.soul_meal.0: Has a much higher rate of dropping
tonic.effect.purity: Removes %s effect(s) when they are applied.
tonic.effect.concealed: Cannot be seen by mobs until you attack.
tonic.effect.silk_touch.1: Activate Silk Touch when breaking blocks.
tonic.effect.fortune: Has a %s%% chance to activate Fortune.
tip.tonic_stand.preserving:
×2 Fuel Efficiency
×2 Purity Efficiency
×0.75 Time Efficiency
recipe.winters_append.explainFuel: At least 1 Fuel is required to brew.
recipe.winters_append.explainLimit:
This Tonic can only have %s of this
effect, regardless of the number of
effects it can hold.
recipe.winters_append.explainPurity:
When Purity is exhausted, recipes
cost more and take longer to brew.
recipe.winters_append.output.span.good.d: This recipe will increase the length of all of the tonic's effects by %s.
recipe.winters_append.output.span.bad.de: This recipe will decrease the length of all of the tonic's effects by %s.
recipe.winters_append.type.tonic: This recipe only works in tonic brewing mode.
recipe.winters_append.type.catalyst: This recipe only works in catalyst brewing mode.
config.winters_append.tonics.title: Tonics
config.winters_append.tonics.desc: Options to change how Tonics work, from duration to price.
group.winters_append.tonics.effects.desc: These control how Tonics' effects should work, from duration to quantity.
option.winters_append.tonics.default_eff: The maximum amount of effects that a standard tonic should have.
option.winters_append.tonics.default_len:
The standard length of a newly created Tonic.
All existing Tonics are adjusted to be offset from this duration.
option.winters_append.tonics.minimum_len: How long a tonic should last with maximum time penalty.
group.winters_append.tonics.brewing.desc: These options control how Tonics should be brewed. How expensive they are, as well as penalties for missing fuel.
option.winters_append.tonics.force_commi: Whenever a valid recipe is in a Tonic Stand, the fuel will actively drain as it progresses.
option.winters_append.tonics.impure_fuel: When out of Purity, this decides how much the fuel price increases.
option.winters_append.tonics.impure_time: When out of Purity, this decides how much longer the brewing time should be.
option.winters_append.tonics.show_durati: If applicable, shows the duration penalty on Tonics.
